about_the_game:
Be a GOLDEN GOBLIN and show your support for the game with this Goblin Goblin Supporter Pack. Allows you to customize your goblin with a Golden material. This can make you FULLY golden and cover up your outfit, or just as a golden shine overlaid on your goblin outfit.

Either way, this pack is 100% cosmetic and is only for people who wish to support the development of the game!
detailed_description:
Be a GOLDEN GOBLIN and show your support for the game with this Goblin Goblin Supporter Pack. Allows you to customize your goblin with a Golden material. This can make you FULLY golden and cover up your outfit, or just as a golden shine overlaid on your goblin outfit.

Either way, this pack is 100% cosmetic and is only for people who wish to support the development of the game!
name: Goblin Summer Camp - Golden Goblin Supporter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual core 3Ghz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: something newer than 10 years old
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
